content.text: Brilliant Stars shines a spotlight on the most dazzling Pokémon and game-changing strategies. Featuring powerful Pokémon ex, dynamic abilities, and mechanics that reward precise timing and synergy, this expansion elevates battles to a new level of excitement. With stunning artwork, radiant full-art cards, and strategies that sparkle with potential, Brilliant Stars invites Trainers to harness brilliance, strike with power, and shine above the rest.
